chapters.title: Chapter 11:  Just Another Sell-Sword
chapters.info: Adelorna Bastine, p. 242—Short, slim, regal, Saldaean Aes Sedai of the Green Ajah. She is the Captain-General of the Green Ajah, the Ajah's leader. She was once birched by Elaida. She chose Rina for the Hall without a nominations process, which goes against Green custom. She has three Warders; one died in the Seanchan attack, and Talric was wounded. She is of a height with Egwene, with tilted eyes and dark hair.
